org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Calculated as the number of times the robot modified any stacks. This includes any additions to existing stacks. Stacks could count twice if, for example, they added totes to a stack that they made before.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Total Stacks Contributed To

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Calculated as the percentage of all abandoned gamepieces divided by all attempts
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Percentage of Gamepieces scored

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: The total number of scored stacks that the robot has tipped over.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Number of Stacks Tipped

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Counts the number of stack records that are marked as including a bin that was not dropped.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Number of Capped Stacks

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Averages all non-zero human player rankings that have been given for this team.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Average Human Player Ranking

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Calculated as the total number of stacks contributed to divided by the total number of matches played in.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Average Stacks Contributed To Per Match

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: The sum of all fouls received by this team.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Total Fouls

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Simply the sum of all yellow/red cards received by the team.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Total Yellow/Red Cards

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: Sum of all coop totes contributed so far by the team.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Total Coop Totes

org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:explanation: The sum of all bins pulled from the middle by this team during auto.
org.wildstang.wildrank.androidv2.views.d.app:label: Total Middle Bins
